nodes.text:
Cancelling student debt would:
🎓Increase Black and Latinx household wealth
🎓Narrow the racial wealth gap
🎓Provide relief to millions of Americans
🎓Provide massive consumer-driven stimulus to our economy
https://t.co/iOOGMulv5q

@rweingarten Why can’t we make education more affordable for students and lower interest rates? Education will never be free, just passed on to us tax payers which will cause our taxes to go up, cost of living to go up and yet our pay will stay the same.
@rweingarten RepubliKKKan Party won’t go for it just off the top two reasons.
@rweingarten What about those that repaid there debt? Will they get reimbursed?
@rweingarten My daughter owes $77,000 and she is white, Anglo and not political in any way! Stuff this in your pipe and smoke it!
@rweingarten @ECMcLaughlin And what you cannot cancel, make the interest rates more reasonable.  It's the interest that makes the debt so daunting.
@WhoseNotes @rweingarten @ECMcLaughlin If it is a federal loan every cent can be cancelled.
@rweingarten पहले नाम बदलो अपना, ला शा बदलते रहना बाद में।
@rweingarten Why Millions Of Kids Can't Read And What Better Teaching Can Do About It\nhttps://t.co/6Md4c09Hve
@marcsimschicago @rweingarten Thanks for posting that article, I found it interesting. I have encountered the same such issues in teaching children to read—

@rweingarten And still not fix the actual problem.... if Universities had to back these loans handed out like candy, there would be far less students admitted, success would have to be the norm post college, or the universities would be bankrupt.
@rweingarten @ECMcLaughlin And don't just cancel it, but restore Fed Financial Aid qualification status for the students taken advantage of by for-profit schools.
@rweingarten @ECMcLaughlin Which are all the reasons Rs don't want to do it...
@rweingarten @ECMcLaughlin I don't know any race poorer than I am and you can come check that out if you want.
@rweingarten @ECMcLaughlin Yeah make all the white blonde girls happy to okay I definitely need this.
